history.proof: intros H. induction H. - qsimpl use: Forall2_nil_inv_r. - qsimpl use: Forall2_cons_inv,Forall2_nil_inv_r.

exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (X Y : Type) (R : X -> Y -> Prop) (x : X) (l : list X) (y : Y) (m : list Y), Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: m) <-> R x y /\\ Forall2 R l m" on hypothesis of type "R x y".

original: intros H. induction H. - apply Forall2_nil_inv_r in H. rewrite H. reflexivity. - apply Forall2_cons_inv in H. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply IHForall2 in H2. rewrite H2. reflexivity.
